bill_title: authorize the secretary of state to enforce the laws that have been enacted to be under the supervision of the Office of the Secretary of State.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the secretary of state to enforce the laws that have been enacted to be under the supervision of the Office of the Secretary of State. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The secretary of state may enforce any law that has been enacted to be under the supervision of the Office of the Secretary of State. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
